question: Year 2020 marks which anniversary of United Nations?
explanation: To mark the 75th anniversary of UN in 2020, a meeting of the UN General Assembly was organized virtually on 21st September 2020. It released a declaration titled "The Future We Want, the UN We Need: Reaffirming our Collective Commitment to Multilateralism". Year 2020 marks 75th anniversary of UN which was established on October 24, 1945.
